import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib import style

style.use('fivethirtyeight')

t1 = pd.read_csv('../input/btcusdt/binance_btcusdt_kline_1m.csv')
t2 = pd.read_csv('../input/btcusdt/okex_btcusdt_kline_1m.csv')

t1 = pd.DataFrame(t1, columns=["c","t"])
t1.set_index("t", inplace = True)
t2 = pd.DataFrame(t2, columns=["c","t"])
t2.set_index("t", inplace = True)

df = pd.merge(t1, t2, on="t", how="outer")
# Sort by index / 按照索引排序
df.sort_index(inplace=True)

# Fill in the numerical / 填充数值
df = df.fillna(axis=0, method="ffill")
print(df.head())

df.plot()
plt.show()
